main event: On August 6, 1952, multiple witnesses observed an unidentified flying object over West Palm Beach, Florida.
interesting points: The object was described as oblong, approximately 30 feet long and hovering about 500 feet above ground., Witnesses noted the object was dull gray in color and made no sound., The object was observed for about 2-3 minutes around 8:15 PM., A different witness reported a bright disc-shaped object, which was estimated to be 50 feet in diameter, flying at 2000 feet altitude at speeds of 400 to 500 knots., Investigations by the Air Force concluded the observed objects could not be definitively identified and are part of Project Blue Book records.
witness description: Witnesses reported seeing the object hover and make sudden changes in direction.
